question_html: Is parking available within 50m of an accessible entrance?
Is the crosswalk leading to the entrance of the parking clearly marked?
Does the parking lot have lighting?
Are the curb cuts/ramps even with the paved surface/road?
Are the curb cuts/ramps brightly marked?
Do curb cuts/ramps have tactile paving?
Is the entrance well lit or does the entrance have good lighting?
Is there a ramped or ground level access at main entrance?
Is an alternative wheelchair entrance available?
Is the automatic access button or automatic door working? (Answer Yes for doorless entrance)
Is the doorway wide enough to allow wheelchair access (width over 38 inches or 96 cm)?
Is seating available? (Lobby, waiting area, park...)
Are chairs with armrests available?
Are chairs/seating removable?
Is there enough space under the tables for wheelchair footrest/leg clearance?
Are there counters at reception/service with lower height for wheelchair access? (There should be at least 1 available)
Do wheelchair accessible counters at reception/service have under counter clearance?
Are there wide aisles/pathways to allow wheelchair/walker access and navigation?
Is the area free of tripping hazards and/or thresholds?
Is there an elevator?
Are there auditory cues in the elevator?
Is there braille signage outside of elevator?
Are there audible indicators that the elevator is arriving?
Are all buttons accessible from a seated position?
Is there enough room in the elevator for a wheelchair to turn?
Does the elevator have automatic verbal announcements indicating floor(s)?
Does the elevator have automatic verbal announcements indicating when going up/going down?
Is there braille or tactile signage for button selection?
Are large print and/or symbol-based signs available inside the elevator?
Is a bathroom available?
Are family/Unisex bathrooms available?
Is the doorway wide enough to allow wheelchair access(width over 38"/96 cm)?
Is the access button or the automatic door working? (Answer "Yes" for doorless entrance)
Is the stall large enough to turn a wheelchair or walker?
Are grab bars mounted beside the toilet?
Is there leg clearance under the sink for wheelchair access?
Is the counter or sink height low enough for wheelchair access?
Do taps have lever handles or working motion sensors?
Is there a working sensor or one hand activated soap dispenser?
Is there a working sensor hand dryer (paper or hot air)?
Is there a large weight capacity change table in a private area?
Is a ceiling track lift available?
Has a roll-in shower (wheelchair accessible or built-in bench)
Are grab bars available in shower or tub area?
Are there picture-based symbols for information and signage?
Is there braille or tactile signage at emergency exits?
Is braille or tactile information available?
Is large print written information available?
Are quiet sections available?
Is free Wi-Fi available?
Is Closed Captioning (CC) available on display screens? Answer "N/A to Location" if there are no screens.
Are assisted listening devices available?
Is signage displayed in high contrast?
Is/Was staff assistance available upon request?
Is ceiling track lift available in the medical or doctor office?
Are large print and/or symbol-based signs available outside the elevator?
Is the toilet seat high enough for wheelchair access?
Are there visual indicators that the elevator is arriving?
